document.full_text: friday's game at atlanta was rained out and rescheduled as a doubleheader saturday, much to the chagrin of the mets, who have limited pitching options.
document.title: second doubleheader in two days doesn't play well with mets
lines_and_colors: friday's game at atlanta was rained out and rescheduled as a doubleheader saturday, much to the chagrin of the mets, who have limited pitching options.
